mapper.select: select case_id,case_time,concat(case_province,case_city, case_district)as case_location,case_desc from case_t where (case_time between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}) and ((#{keyword}='全部') or (case_id like '%${keyword}%') or (case_type like '%${keyword}%') or (case_province like '%${keyword}%') or (case_city like '%${keyword}%')or (case_district like '%${keyword}%')or (case_desc like '%${keyword}%')) ;
select case_id,case_time,concat(case_province,case_city, case_district)as case_location,case_desc from case_t where case_id=#{id};
